snippet: Boris Okuliar, recently a managing director at UBS, is joining Carlyle as head of capital markets in the firm’s global market strategies group. Carlyle is best known for private equity deals, but its market strategies business is also a major...
abstract: Boris Okuliar, recently a managing director at UBS, is joining Carlyle as head of capital markets in the firm’s global market strategies group. Carlyle is best known for private equity deals, but its market strategies business is also a major focus.

headline.main: Carlyle Hires UBS Executive for Market Strategies Group
